article: There was a little boy who got angry easily. His father gave him a bag of nails and told him that every  _  he got angry, to drive a nail into the back wall. The first day the boy had  _  37 nails into the wall. Then he put fewer and fewer nails. He found it was  _  to be not angry than to drive those  _  into the wall. Finally the day came when the boy didn't get  _  at all. He told his father about it and the father suggested that the boy now pull out one nail for each day that he was able to be not angry. The days  _  and the young boy was finally able to tell his father that  _  nails were gone. The father took his son by the hand and led him to the  _  . He said, "You have done  _  , my son, but look at the holes in the wall. The wall will  _  be the same. When you say things  _  , they leave a scar just like this one. You  _  put a knife in a man and draw it out. It won't matter  how many times  you say I'm sorry, the wound is still there. A mental hurt is as bad as a physical one. Friends are a very rare jewel, indeed. They make you  _  and encourage you to succeed. They lend an ear, they share a word of praise, and they always  _  to open their hearts to us.
